question.title: Mapstruct mapping to default list item values
question.body:
Is there a way to map to constants to a list item?

@Mapping(constant = "constantId", target = "items[0].id")

So im wondering if i am missing an easy way to do this?

I am hoping to use

@Mapping(constant = "constantId", target = "id")
@Mapping(expression = "java(LocalDate.of(2019,12,31))", target = "dateOfBirth")
Item toItem(String test);

But how would i go about calling this from the mapper? I cannot find a way to map only default values. I tried with the string placeholder but that it becomes an error if non-iterable to iterable. And i cannot figureout how to pass a placeholder list.
